findings.rationale: The five-year duration may not be sufficient for certain types of confidential information, potentially exposing the parties to risk after the agreement expires.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing injunctive relief without posting bond can expose the other party to immediate legal actions without the ability to contest the necessity of such relief.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restricting assignment may limit the parties' ability to transfer their interests in the agreement, potentially affecting business operations in the event of mergers or acquisitions.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
